posts.post_title: FS 1887 N172 old judge old hoss radbourne graded authentic
posts.post_content:
I have for sale a SGC graded authentic old hoss radbourne N172 old judge
Card is in poor shape but affordable way to pick up a expensive HOF card

Price is 400 shipped paypal gift preferred

Send request for pictures to [url]michael.mcguffin@hotmail.com[/url]
